CustomField.description: "Amount that is being credited/debited on the client's account NB: Data for creditor and debtor amount is received in the same field/column from Proact US-4409 US-4456 US-4425"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the amount that is being credited/debited on the client's account This is the amount that is flowing in or out of the client's account
CustomField.label: Transaction Amount
